duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate business with existing clients and propose exceptional technology solutions to enhance business operations.
Create and manage a positive business relationship between the company and top-level clients.
Provide sales support and collaborate with project managers to create accurate sales proposals for multi-year renewals/upgrades, software and hardware upgrades, and projects.
Receive consistent one-on-one training and ongoing mentoring from other team members.
Receive hands-on experience and training using sales tools and tactics to promote and sell products and services within the St. Louis region.
Be involved in the Annual all-day strategy meeting and Quarterly half-day strategy meetings to help set the direction of the company’s focus and culture.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree in business or IT Technology or Sales or equivalent experience.
